q: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
h:
“In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.” —
Robert Frost

q: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
h:
“Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.” —
Peter Drucker

q: Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.
h:
“Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.
h:
“Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: Bad things are not the worst things that an happen to us. NOTHING is the worst thing that can happen to us.
h:
“Bad things are not the worst things that an happen to us. NOTHING is the worst thing that can happen to us.” —
Richard Bach

q: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
h:
“The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

q: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
h:
“Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.” —
Dan Brown

q: Convinced myself, I seek not to convince.
h:
“Convinced myself, I seek not to convince.” —
Edgar Allan Poe

q: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
h:
“Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough. ” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
h:
“All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.” —
Walt Disney

q: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
h:
“Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.” —
Marilyn Monroe

q: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is enlightenment.
h:
“Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is enlightenment.” —
Lao Tzu

q: Positive thinking can be contagious. Being surrounded by winners helps you develop into a winner.
h:
“Positive thinking can be contagious. Being surrounded by winners helps you develop into a winner.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

q: Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
h:
“Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.” —
Og Mandino

q: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
h:
“Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.
h:
“It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.” —
Alan Watts

q: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
h:
“Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
h:
“There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.” —
Vincent van Gogh

q: Life is but one dream flowing into another.
h:
“Life is but one dream flowing into another.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: A man has to learn that he cannot command things but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others but that he can mold and master his own will.
h:
“A man has to learn that he cannot command things but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others but that he can mold and master his own will.” —
James Allen

q: Do not believe that you will reach your destination without leaving the shore.
h:
“Do not believe that you will reach your destination without leaving the shore. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: I succeeded by saying what everyone else is thinking.
h:
“I succeeded by saying what everyone else is thinking.” —
Joan Rivers

q: Who wishes to fight must first count the cost.
h:
“Who wishes to fight must first count the cost.” —
Sun Tzu

q: If you quit once it becomes a habit.
h:
“If you quit once it becomes a habit.” —
Michael Jordan

q: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
h:
“One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.
h:
“Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.” —
Charles Dickens

q: Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
h:
“Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.” —
William James

q: By words the mind is winged.
h:
“By words the mind is winged.” —
Aristophanes

q: Every day passes whether you participate or not.
h:
“Every day passes whether you participate or not.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

q: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
h:
“Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.” —
John Lennon

q: Patience expands your options. If you insist on immediate gratification, your choices are severely limited.
h:
“Patience expands your options. If you insist on immediate gratification, your choices are severely limited.” —
Ralph Marston

q: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
h:
“You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.” —
Mae West

q: Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.
h:
“Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.” —
Robert Greene

q: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
h:
“Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: The more you extend kindness to yourself, the more it will become your automatic response to others.
h:
“The more you extend kindness to yourself, the more it will become your automatic response to others.” —
Wayne Dyer

q: People should pursue what they're passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.
h:
“People should pursue what they're passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.” —
Elon Musk

q: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
h:
“Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

q: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
h:
“It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.” —
Herman Melville

q: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
h:
“Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.” —
Elon Musk

q: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, expect to win.
h:
“You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, expect to win.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

q: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
h:
“Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Give so much away people insist on paying you.
h:
“Give so much away people insist on paying you.” —
Jack Butcher

q: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.
h:
“To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.” —
Bodhidharma

q: Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.
h:
“Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.” —
D. H. Lawrence

q: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
h:
“Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
h:
“Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.” —
Plato

q: When you're the only sane person, you look like the only insane person.
h:
“When you're the only sane person, you look like the only insane person.” —
Criss Jami

q: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
h:
“Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.” —
Confucius

q: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment.
h:
“If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
h:
“Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.” —
Andrew Carnegie
